    JuliennedArrays.Align — Type.
    Align(it, along...)
    julia> using JuliennedArrays

julia> array = [[1, 2], [3, 4]];

julia> aligned = Align(array, False(), True())
2×2 Align{Int64,2,Array{Array{Int64,1},1},Tuple{False,True}}:
 1  2
 3  4

julia> aligned[1, 1] = 5;

julia> collect(aligned)
2×2 Array{Int64,2}:
 5  2
 3  4

    JuliennedArrays.Slices — Type.
    Slices(array, code...)
    julia> using JuliennedArrays

julia> it = [1 2; 3 4];

julia> Slices(it, False(), True())
2-element Slices{SubArray{Int64,1,Array{Int64,2},Tuple{Int64,Base.OneTo{Int64}},true},1,Array{Int64,2},Tuple{False,True}}:
 [1, 2]
 [3, 4]
